item.title: Value Object [DDD]
item.description: This metaphor does not fit completely, and the “Money-Example” is omnipresent, but I really like the pattern and so that’s the story: Let’s say you have your grannies recipe for a chocolate cookie and you want to keep this in mind, but also you like to somehow experiment with some new or different ingredients. Normally you just keep in mind what you changed and later you write down the new recipe.
